NewDialog.&7&lMikhail: I heard that you are working for that &oStatera&r company.
They give out special gadgets to their employees whenever they come back from a mission.
They are pretty useless but if you bring me a full set of &l8&r gadgets, I might have something for you.

4.name: &b&lInfo
description: Completing tasks for the &bStatera&f company may be rewarded with some special collectibles.
These don't have any effect just by themselves but if you have a full set of 8 different ones, they become very valuable!
Trade them with a &7Shady Merchant&f and receive a &cm&6y&es&at&9e&br&5y &f reward.

40.name: &e&lTRADE
description: &c&l!! &cOnly do this if you have one of all 8 items

NewDialog.&7&lMikhail: So you want to trade your items huh?
I only deal with serious people so once you start trading, &cthere is no turning back!
Feel free to come back later.

HasItem.name: &c&lAn apple a day...
HasItem.description:
&fAt &bStatera&f, healthy food is really important. Employees nom away on these bad boys all day long!

&7&oMain Quest item

HasItem.name: &d&lCompany cooled strawberry juice
HasItem.description:
&fAll that training can make a trainer thirsty. Enjoy some fresh strawberry juice provided by our sponsor &bStatera&f!

&7&oMain Quest item

HasItem.name: &6&lA snowman's nose
HasItem.description:
&fImagine being a carrot, everyone would be rooting for you! Proudly sponsored by &bStatera&f!

&7&oMain Quest item

HasItem.name: &4&lPrickly friend
HasItem.description:
&bStatera&f provides these lovely berries as friends. They might seem delicious at first but watch out for those thorns! 

&7&oMain Quest item

HasItem.name: &e&lA heart of gold
HasItem.description:
&fCourtesy of &bStatera&f, everyone can enjoy a healthy snack!

&7&oMain Quest item

HasItem.name: &4&lA watery mess
HasItem.description:
&fCan you eat this without making a mess? &bStatera&f bets you can!

&7&oMain Quest item

HasItem.name: &b&lSoulfood
HasItem.description:
&fEveryone at &bStatera&f loves these. Keep yours safe before a colleague "loses" it!

&7&oMain Quest item

HasItem.name: &6&lBread
HasItem.description:
&fPair it with some cheese and this loaf of bread becomes a real &bStatera&f sandwich!

&7&oMain Quest item

NewDialog.&7&lMikhail: You don't even have the stuff!
